TextAsset.value: (Lolo is taking me to the yearbook club room.
I guess this is it.
Hmm, there’s more people here than I thought there’d be.)
Hello, newcomer! Welcome to Yearbook Club!
I hope you’re ready to join us in capturing the memories of another great school year!
I’M SO EXCITED
(Are they...
...Serious...)
C’mon, ${slot:playerName}. Let’s go sit in the back and work on our...
Yearbook... stuff.
(I’m sure glad I came here with Lolo.
Looks like those other Yearbook Club members are preoccupied at the front of the class...
I don’t think they’re paying attention to the two of us just sitting here in the back.
That’s a relief. )
I’m kinda surprised you would join a club just to goof off.
Huh? How come?
I dunno. You just seem like...
The goody-two-shoes, Pollyanna type.
No offense, I guess...
None taken...
I’m glad we can just chill here anyway.
It’s pretty weird, right?
What’s weird?
The other kids in the club.
They seem to care SO MUCH about this.
It kinda creeps me out.
Haha, aww...
That’s a little harsh, isn’t it?
I mean...
I wouldn’t get so into a club like this, but...
It’s kinda cool that they’re so sincerely interested in it.
...Heh. Maybe you ARE a goody-two-shoes.
You really don’t see anything... I dunno... kinda charming about it?
In people deceiving themselves?
What do you mean?
Isn’t it obvious...
Everyone hates high school, don’t they?
And nobody stays in touch after they leave.
It’s all … meaningless time.
So why waste your energy making a book of memories you’d really rather not even have?
Everybody just drifts away...
Or they realize that the people they thought were their friends weren’t really friends to begin with.
Lolo...
It isn’t just high school, either.
Everyone goes through life spending time with their “friends”...
Until they have to leave for one reason or another, and they forget all about them.
That doesn’t happen every time, though... does it?
Yes. It does.
(Yikes! She seems pretty sure about that... I won’t argue.
It doesn’t seem like she’s saying stuff like this just to be cool though...
I think something must have happened to her.
She seems so cute and innocent...
It’s strange her attitude would be like this.
But maybe that’s just my own assumptions.)
Hey, Lolo! ${slot:playerName}!
Are you both working hard on Yearbook business?
(Yikes! I got caught off guard!
What do I say?!)
Uh, yeah, totally.
We’re, like... brainstorming the best places for, uh...
Casual photo ops and stuff like that.
Omygosh! That sounds SO CUTE! <3
Good work, guys! We’ll leave you to it then!
Haha... nice save.
Yeah...
Uhh... sorry for unloading on you like that.
I mean, before the sunshine squad busted in on us.
Huh? Oh, no...
It’s okay.
Yeah. I guess it doesn’t matter anyway.
It’s just that I haven’t really talked to anyone in a while.
Really?
I’d have guessed a girl like you would be swarming in friends.
Heh.
Trying to flatter me, eh...?
You’re all the same...
I see what you’re after.
O-oh!
Wh-what!
N-no, I’m- Not like that-
You heard about my priestess powers, right?
Well, you’re outta luck.
I’m not that girl anymore.
‘Sides, I was always pretty terrible at that stuff, even when I was trying.
Priestess powers...?
Yeah, it was like magic stuff.
Not really a big deal…
Klonoa always acted like it was, but whatever.
Klonoa?
Who was that? A friend of yours?
Yeah right...
I haven’t thought about him in forever.
(Uh oh... Looks like I hit a bullseye without meaning to.
That Klonoa person from her past...
Could he have something to do with why she’s like this now?)
Uh...
Was he your boyfriend, or something?
..Heh.
Not really...
I’m way too ugly to have a boyfriend.
Whaaaa?
What are you talking about?
You’re joking, right?
You don’t have to pretend to be all shocked.
I’m not being down on myself.
Just being realistic.
Lolo, I’m not pretending!
There’s nothing ugly about you!
Maybe you can’t see it... because you’re such a pollyanna.
But if I pointed it out to you, you’d see...
Nobody’d be interested in me because of it.
It doesn’t bother me, though.
I’m used to it.
(What could she possibly be talking about?
Her tail, maybe?
Maybe she has some scar or something...
I better not guess at it.
If I guessed the wrong thing, I’d hurt her feelings.
She seems pretty sensitive, after all...
Haha. I bet she’d try to kick my butt if she knew I was thinking that.)
… What are you smiling about?
Haha... nothing.
I just like hanging out with you I guess.
Hmf. You’re pretty weird.
Not that what I think matters or anything.
${slot:playerName}... now that we’re talking...
Do you ever feel sometimes like...
Like nothing matters?
Like you can’t bring yourself to care?
No matter how nice people are?
No matter how close to them you think you’ve become?
Do you feel like there’s always a gulf there...
That will never close, no matter what you do?
I... I think that’s going a little far.
I guess I feel that way sometimes, but definitely not all the time.
And I’ve never felt like I could never care at all about other people.
I’m sorry...
I wish I could relate.
But I don’t want to lie.
… Heh. Okay.
Just more proof, I guess.
That I’m...
That you’re...
What?
...Nevermind.
Looks like this dumb club is finally almost done, anyway.
Wait, Lolo!
If this Klonoa person...
If he ever said anything mean to you...
Ever made you feel bad about yourself or feel like you don’t matter-
Shut up!
It wasn’t like that. You don’t get it...
You don’t get me, either.
I mean, I don’t blame you...
But you really don’t get it.
I... I’m sorry if I overstepped my bounds.
But if you ever need to talk...
I’m here, okay?
You’re a weird person, ${slot:playerName}...
Or a weird katamari-thing, anyway.
I don’t think I really get you, either.
(Is that all she’s going to say about it?)
Whoops, there’s the bell, guys!
Great job, everyone! See you tomorrow! Let’s have another great day!
Keep on making great Namco High memories!
Heh. Saved by the bell, huh?
Finally.
Ugh, I hope they won’t make us pose for any dumb pictures or anything when this is all over.
U-uh...
Well, now that club's over...
Want to grab something to eat?
W-with me, I mean...
...Heh.
${slot:playerName}, you seem pretty nice.
So, someone like you...
I’m just going to end up disappointing you.
Not that it really matters in the end, but...
What I’m trying to say is, don’t get yourself all wound up over me.
See you later, I guess.
(Shoot. She’s gone.
That innocent-looking girl... she used to be a magic priestess and go on adventures...
But now, it seems like all her interest in life is gone.
Something bad must have happened to her, I know it.
But what?
She acts like she doesn’t care, but... she definitely opened up to me today.
Maybe if I just stick around, she’ll be happy.)
